page.title: 20CHILDREN'S STREET GAMES
page.content: BY: Tanya,Kerrie & Joanne The street games we like playing are {Double Dutch, Bulldog, 44 Save All, {Tennis, Stooll Ball, Football, Wall {Ball, Red Rover and Postmans Knock. {Double Dutch}is skipping with two ropes.{Bulldog}is a simple game of running and catching.{44 Save All}is like hide and seek, but you have to get to the post before the other person sees you.{Stoolball}is like cricket with a white square wicket. {Wall Ball}is like football but you have to kick a ball against a wall. { Red Rover}is a game with two teams they stand opposite each other and then call a person over.If the person can't break between their two arms, they are on their side.{Postmans Knock is knocking on peoples' doors and running away before they open it and catch you.
